'''Protective Proliferating Organism''' is a special enemy encountered during Phase 2 of the [[Guardian of Apep's Oasis]] Weekly Boss.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats|dendro_res=50%|hp_ratio=3.2|hp_type=2|hide_atk=1|hide_notes=1}}

==Abilities==
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = Protective Proliferating Organism

|name_1      = Shield Support
|desc_1      = Provides a {{Dendro}} [[Shield/Enemy|shield]] to nearby Preliminary Proliferating Organisms, granting them immunity to DMG. The shield's durability refreshes to full every 0.5 seconds, and the Protective Proliferating Organism must be defeated to permanently remove the shields.
}}
